spatial_accuracy.notes: The 3D render fails to follow the 2D layout. The entrance door is missing, stairs are relocated, and window placements are entirely different from the floor plan specifications.

structural_fidelity.notes: The central bathroom core is missing. The relationship between the kitchen (now a bedroom/bath hybrid) and living areas is disregarded. Hallucinated rooms appear in the background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is hallucinated; a bed and bathtub are placed in areas designated as living/dining/kitchen in the 2D plan. Scale is inconsistent with the floor plan dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The rendering quality is high with good lighting, clean geometry, and a correct isometric perspective. However, it fails as an architectural representation.

detected_errors.description: Missing central bathroom unit and entrance door.
Staircase moved from bottom-left to center-right wall.
Hallucinated bedroom furniture and bathtub in kitchen/living zones.
Hallucinated rooms/voids beyond the back wall not present in 2D plan.
Window proportions and counts do not match the orange indicators in the plan.
